name: Objective
description:
Objective is one of the leading providers of business solutions and technical consulting services in Brazil’s communications industry. They provide customized solutions using agile methodologies, training, and coaching, serving customers from highly innovative start-up companies to large leading enterprises.
With a strong presence in national and international events and consultancies, they’re currently investing in new verticals to serve the education, retail, and health industries with excellence.
